code.description: Live horses, asses, mules and hinnies

Rhododendrons and azaleas, grafted or not
Seeds, fruit and spores, of a kind used for sowing

Mineral or chemical fertilisers containing two or three of the fertilising elements nitrogen, phosphorus and potassium; other fertilisers; goods of this chapter in tablets or similar forms or in packages of a gross weight not exceeding 10 kg

Insecticides, rodenticides, fungicides, herbicides, anti-sprouting products and plant-growth regulators, disinfectants and similar products, put up in forms or packings for retail sale or as preparations or articles (for example, sulphur-treated bands, wicks and candles, and fly-papers)

Beet seeds, seeds for forage plants; other raw vegetable materials

category.description: Supply of goods and services of a kind normally intended for use in agricultural production but excluding capital goods such as machinery or buildings

vatRateResults.comment:
Portuguese VAT law does not depend of CN or CPA codes to apply reduced taxes rates. For this reason, the following codes are approximate and not legally binding. For sake of certainty, reference should be made to the Portuguese VAT law (decree law n.º 394-B/1984, of December 28)
Some products are taxed at 13%. 
The tax rate on animals applies only to live stock, agricultural labor and reproductive.

code.description: Meat of bovine animals, fresh or chilled

Forequarters, whole or cut into a maximum of five pieces, each quarter being in a single block; ‘compensated’ quarters in two blocks, one of which contains the forequarter, whole or cut into a maximum of five pieces, and the other, the hindquarter, excluding the tenderloin, in one piece

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and …

vatRateResults.comment:
Foodstuffs are also taxed at 0%,13% and 23%.
Portuguese VAT law does not depend of CN or CPA codes to apply reduced taxes rates. For this reason, the following codes are approximate and not legally binding. For sake of certainty, reference should be made to the Portuguese VAT law (decree law n.º 394-B/1984, of December 28)

category.description: Parking rates (Article 105a(3) of the VAT Directive)

vatRateResults.comment: The parking rate of 13% applies to: 1. Wine, with the exclusion of “special wines” as fortified wines, liqueur wines or sparkling wines. 2. Agricultural tools and utensils, mobile silos, tractors, pumps and other machinery designed exclusively or mainly for the purpose of agriculture, cattle breeding or forestry. 3. Diesel for agriculture.

category.description: The renovation and repair of private dwellings, excluding materials which account for a significant part of the value of the service supplied

vatRateResults.comment: The reduced rate on the repairing of private dwellings excludes cleaning, garden upkeep, swimming pools, sauna, tennis court, golf or mini-golf court, or similar. Includes materials that accounts for less than 20% of the value of the service supplied.

code.description: Sea and coastal passenger water transport services

category.description: Transport of passengers and their accompanying luggage

vatRateResults.comment: International transport of passengers is subject to a zero rate.

category.description: Supply of electricity, district heating and district cooling, and biogas produced by the feedstock listed in Annex IX, Part A, to Directive (EU) 2018/2001 of the European Parliament and of the Council;

vatRateResults.comment:
6% for the fixed component of electricity supplies in power contracts 3.45 kVA and for the supply of electricity for consumption, excluding its fixed components, in power contracts 6.90 kVA, and with limits in kWh consumption per 30 days;  
6% for the fixed component of natural gas supplies in lower pressure contracts (10 000 m3); supply and installation of highly efficient low emissions heating systems; firewood
